Uses of Interface
filters.IFilter

Packages that use IFilter
filters   
 

Uses of IFilter in filters
 

Subinterfaces of IFilter in filters
 interface IPullFilter<in,out>
          Interface IPullfilter two methods: read():out isAvailable(): boolean
 interface IPushFilter<in,out>
          Interface IPushFilter two methods: write(in input) flush();
 

Classes in filters that implement IFilter
 class ActiveFilter<in,out>
          Active Filter implements Runnable and IFilter Knows the previous pipe and flushes the data if no input (output of the previous pipe) is no longe available
 class PullFilter<in,out>
          Implements IPullFilter can flush, process data Overrides isAvailable!
 class PullSink<in,out>
          The datasink for Pullfilters
 class PullSource<in,out>
          Overrides isAvailable
